column4: ﻿i did a "sudo apt-get install postfix" on ubuntu 8.04 , during installation i get a screen with POSTFIX CONFIGURATION, and there's <ok> at the end, but i dont know how to proceed to the next step.
﻿i did a "sudo apt-get install postfix" on ubuntu 8.04 , during installation i get a screen with POSTFIX CONFIGURATION, and there's <ok> at the end, but i dont know how to proceed to the next step.
hit the TAB key  to get to the OK - and hit enter. :)
